Interrogator: Okay, so, describe the conversation between the delivery boy and the chef.
Interrogee: So, the chef was very happy for the delivery boy. The delivery boy comes from a poor neighborhood, and lately, he has been getting so many orders. The chef was saying, "You have done a very well job, and you always receive nice feedbacks. And you should continue this work, and you should encourage other delivery boys to behave like you."

Interrogator: Describe what the delivery boy observed when he entered the house.
Interrogee: So, when the delivery boy entered the house, he saw that all the stuff in the house were distorted, and it was lying on the floor. There was a broken window, broken photo frames, and the couch was completely ruined. And everything was in shambles.

Interrogator: How did the delivery boy receive the message for help, and what were his actions after receiving the message?
Interrogee: So, he received the message through the feedback that when an order is delivered, the customer has the option to give feedback through a message on the delivery app. So, a message was written, "Help," and then he enters the house.

Interrogator: So how did he used to deliver the food?
Interrogee: He used a car to deliver the food.

Interrogator: Describe how the woman in the house treated the delivery boy.
Interrogee: The woman in the house was quite welcoming toward the delivery boy. She was continuously asking him to get in the house, have some drink or some water. And she also gave him a huge tip of $400, and she was quite humbled towards him.

Interrogator: How old was she?
Interrogee: So, she was middle-aged, I presume 20 to 25, although her age was not mentioned in the video.

Interrogator: So is there any suspicious activity that the boy observed?
Interrogee: So, the only suspicious activity he observed was the help message that he received through the feedback. And when he re-enters the house, he saw the whole room disoriented, he saw the stuff lying around and broken photographs. That's what made him suspicious.

Interrogator: So the lady herself gave the message for help?
Interrogee: No, there was someone, might be her husband, who left the message.

Interrogator: So, he was not there right then, how did he give the message?
Interrogee: Later in the video, it was shown he was the one who ordered the food, and he was able to call for help. His wife was holding him as a hostage, and by ordering food, he was able to get help.

Interrogator: So, by what medium did he give the message?
Interrogee: The feedback, whenever we receive an order, we have to provide feedback.

Interrogator: On the paper or on the phone?
Interrogee: On the phone.

Interrogator: On the phone, he gave the feedback after receiving the food?
Interrogee: Yes.

Interrogator: Describe the body language of the woman while receiving the order.
Interrogee: The body language of the woman was quite touchy. She was continuously touching the boy, and although he was not liking it, she was forcing him to come into the house and have some drinks. But the boy refused. When he delivered the order, he asked, "Is that for a party, or is it the order for only one?" She said it was an order for one, and then she gave him a tip of $400, and then he left.

Interrogator: So, I think the delivery boy got suspicious of the woman, and that's how he got so much tip?
Interrogee: No, he never questioned that. But as soon as he put the tip in his pocket and entered his car, he received the message for help. That's what made him suspicious.

Interrogator: Did he ask the woman why she ordered too much food for only one?
Interrogee: No, the woman did not stand there at the door for too long, and she left after giving him the tip.

Interrogator: Describe what the delivery boy observed when he entered the inner room?
Interrogee: So, when he entered the inner room, it was completely ruined. There was food and other stuff lying on the floor, and there was a bathtub covered with plastic. When he removed the plastic covering, he found the dead body of a man.

Interrogator: Okay, when the boy entered the inner room, where was the lady?
Interrogee: She was not shown where she was, but when he entered the inner room, soon after that, she came into the inner room.

Interrogator: So, the lady didn't see the boy coming into the room?
Interrogee: No, he entered through a different door. He didn't enter from the main entry; he entered from the back door.

Interrogator: Discuss the action of the woman when she found the delivery boy in the inner room.
Interrogee: She became furious. She said, "You were not supposed to see this," and she had a pistol in her hand. She marched toward the boy and tried to shoot him. She fired a shot, but she missed. Then her leg tripped over some noodles that were lying on the floor, and she fell. She hit herself in the head with one of the shots.

Interrogator: So she fired a bullet at the boy but she missed it, and how did the woman die?
Interrogee: So while she was firing a shot at the boy, she tripped over some noodles that were lying on the floor, and she fell. While falling, she shot herself in the head.

Interrogator: She fell and she shot herself?
Interrogee: Yes, she fell, and she was trying to balance herself, and then by mistake, she fired a shot, and it hit her head, and she died.

Interrogator: Okay, then what was the action of the boy after that?
Interrogee: So, after that, the boy checked if the woman was alive. Then he ran away from the house. He ran outside. Then he remembered that the man was there, and he went to check if the man was alive because he received feedback from the man. So, he thought that there are chances that the man might be alive. But when he reentered the house and checked if the man was alive, the man was dead, and then he left.

Interrogator: And how was the man killed?
Interrogee: So, he was killed by having his throat cut.

Interrogator: By a knife or a gun?
Interrogee: By a knife.

Interrogator: Okay, firstly she cut his throat with a knife, and then she had a gun also?
Interrogee: Yes.

Interrogator: Okay, so why did she kill her husband? I don't know. And describe the state of the delivery boy after he confirmed that the woman is dead.
Interrogee: So, after he confirmed that the woman is dead, he ran away from the house. He entered his car, but then he remembered that a man was in the bathtub. He might be alive, so he went back in to check if the man was alive. But the man was also dead, and then he left.

Interrogator: Describe the attitude and performance of the delivery boy regarding his work.
Interrogee: He was quite serious about his job, and as mentioned by the chef, he was liked by most of his customers, and he always used to get high ratings. Lately, he has been doing good in his job.
